page.title: 16TOURISM
page.content: Tourism is important to Cornwall because of the people employed in the tourist industry and the financial benefits for local businesses. Our area is close to one of the main tourist areas of Cornwall with the crowded tourist beaches of Praa Sands and Porthleven only a few miles away. There are many visitors passing through our area and many private houses offer bed and breakfast accommodation during the summer season. The local shops and pubs depend on their summer trade to supplement their low winter takings and without tourism many of them would close. Tourism then is important to our area even though no major tourist attractions are actually within our boundaries.
